definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: So the place site of fable "the ass of Qian "have nothing to Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: “黔之驴”寓言故事发生地点，完全与贵州无关。

sentences.english: Nor do we have any evidence in any other historical place.
sentences.chinese: 其他历史地点也没有任何证据。

sentences.english: We can refund the full fare ticket for you.
sentences.chinese: 您的客票限制在原出票地点退票。

sentences.english: Anyone confirmed to buy, pls leave your moblle number, time and location.
sentences.chinese: 如肯定买，请留电话，时间，地点。

sentences.english: This torch is then carried by a relay of runners to the site of the Summer or Winter games.
sentences.chinese: 之后这支火炬由跑者接力送至夏季或冬季比赛地点。

sentences.english: Hero's classes will be held at the Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art.
sentences.chinese: 赫罗的上课地点将在拉斯金绘画和美术学院。

sentences.english: The Soko Islands were a favorite destination.
sentences.chinese: 索罟群岛是最理想的地点。

sentences.english: A polling station is where I vote and is listed on my Elector Information Card.
sentences.chinese: 投票站是我前往投票的地方，在选民登记列明地点。

sentences.english: The position will be based mainly in SiHui city & Foshan, Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 工作地点主要是在广东佛山三水四会市。

sentences.english: We appointed the school-house as place for the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我们确定校舍为会面地点。

sentences.english: Here's a list of all the checkins I did in Zurich, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，下面是我在苏黎世记录的全部地点的列表。

sentences.english: Rescue workers rushed to the site.
sentences.chinese: 营救人员赶往雪崩地点。

sentences.english: The fire was warm, however, and the nursery dimly lit by three night-lights, and presently the sewing lay on Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 炉火暖融融的，育儿室里半明半暗地点着三盏夜灯。

sentences.english: Follow this up with a succinct description of the location followed by a dash and a time reference.
sentences.chinese: 接着，简要地说明地点，然后用一个破折号提及时间。

definition: time of business/opening hours (of shop)/working time
time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
